name: Gehenna
description:
GAME:
Gehenna is a 2 player card game where players must utilize their supernatural armies to defeat the enemy king or capture the enemy prophet. 
Players start with a faction, the UCMF, the United Colonies Military Force, or the Algiman, a symbiant vampiric-like alien species. 
Each side possesses characters with special skills and/or abilities. Players must use their unique characters to overpower or outsmart their enemy in turn based battle.

CURRENTLY WORKING: 
Card spawn and randomization. Field reset.

CONTROLS:
MOUSE and CLICKER
Move the mouse to the "draw cards" in the middle of the screen. This deals 10 cards out of a deck of 30 cards. Each deck of 30 cards contains 3 copies of 10 types of soldiers. Press the reset button to clear the field.
